name: Interrio M
description:
After a long war between kaiju's the world has finally found peace at the hands of Morphea an organization bent on keeping the global peace between humans and kaiju's also known as Morph's.

You will take part in an  interactive adventure with kaiju's! In this game you will interrogate suspects which are hiding secrets that could destroy the world. 

Available for PC,MAC and Linux 

(current version only has one case, but is fully playable and has multiple endings. One feature is not operational which is the alarm button, but soon it will be implemented in later updates.) 

I have plans for web release but not until I iron out the phone assets. 

Controls: 

Use your mouse to click and select choices. 

There will be a menu to select from various options 

The rules of the game are simple, interrogate the suspect 

-You only get 3 chances to persuade the suspect to speak the truth

-if you fail twice your suspect will get away with concealing the truth. 

-If the truth is concealed you earn no points. You lose.

-The only way to get to the truth is by understanding your suspect.
